snippet: For Broadway producers, a Hollywood star can be the key to financing a Broadway revival, and to turning a profit.
abstract: Hollywood stars can be the key to financing a Broadway revival, and to turning a profit; stars like Scarlett Johansson and Al Pacino have become so essential to Broadway, both for attracting investors and selling tickets, that they are calling the shots as never before, bringing back recently staged plays and sometimes edging out new works.
lead_paragraph: For Broadway producers, a Hollywood star can be the key to financing a Broadway revival, and to turning a profit.
